paper_abstract: Pach and Toth [14] proved that any n-vertex graph of genus g and maximum degree d has a planar crossing number at most c(g)dn, for a constant c > 1. We improve on this results by decreasing the bound to O(dyn), if g = o(n), and to O(g(2)), otherwise, and also prove that our result is tight within a constant factor.
paper_title: Planar crossing numbers of genus g graphs
